EmailTemplate.name: Change Request - Add an Account Owner
EmailTemplate.subject: Axos Bank Change Request - Add an Additional Account Owner
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Contact},
We will be happy to assist you with adding an additional account owner. This will be a two-step process:
Step 1: Complete the Change Request: Add an Account Owner form.
Step 2: Return the completed Addition of Account owner Change request for processing by:
Secure Message: Login to Online Banking, click on Contact Us, and send a secure email with a scanned copy of the signed documents Fax to: 858-350-0443; or Mail to: Axos Bank Deposit Operations: New Accounts PO BOX 509127 San Diego, CA 92150-9948
Your change request will be reviewed within three business days upon receipt of the Addition of Account Owner Change form.
We appreciate your business and commit to providing superior banking products, support and services.
Best Regards, {!User.FirstName} Axos Bank Customer Service
